meanings.definition: Moving or able to move through the air using wings.
meanings.sent1: The bird showed its flying abilities by soaring high in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The flying squirrel glided effortlessly from tree to tree.
meanings.sent3: The flying fish decided to take a break and relax on a cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination was like a flying carpet, carrying her to magical lands.
meanings.sent5: The kite's flying colors brightened up the gray sky.

meanings.sent1: The flying insects buzzed around the garden in search of nectar.
meanings.sent2: The flying geese formed a perfect V-shape in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The flying umbrella got caught in a gust of wind and went on an adventure.
meanings.sent4: His dreams were like flying clouds, drifting through the vast blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The hot air balloon's flying journey offered breathtaking views of the landscape.

meanings.sent1: The flying cheetah sprinted across the savannah in pursuit of its prey.
meanings.sent2: The flying bullets whizzed past, narrowly missing their target.
meanings.sent3: The flying car broke the speed limit and left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent4: His words were like flying arrows, hitting the mark every time.
meanings.sent5: The racing car's flying speed set a new record on the track.
